title: Soul of Flight
summaries: The Soul of Flight is a Hardmode crafting material used to craft several different types of wings and the Soul of Flight in a Bottle.
Souls of Flight are dropped by Wyverns and Arch Wyverns and are the most common soul aside from the Souls of Light and Night.

Souls of Flight are dropped at the position of the Wyvern's head upon death, and like all other souls, float in midair at the drop point, rather than falling to the ground. This can make Souls of Flight more difficult to spot, e.g. if the Wyvern's head was off-screen or within blocks at the time of death.

Crafting all Wings that require Souls of Flight requires 300 / 315 / 295 [img:Nintendo 3DS version] Souls of Flight, meaning the player must defeat 30-60 or 15-30 Wyverns / 32-63 Wyverns or 15-60 Arch Wyverns .

statistics.Tooltip: 'The essence of powerful flying creatures'
statistics.Sell: 2
